rice.name: Mexican Rice
rice.description: This is a luscious dessert crafted from short-grain white rice, slowly cooked in creamy whole milk.

rice.name: Spanish rice
rice.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from long-grain white rice, gently sautéed with aromatic onions and garlic, then simmered in a tantalizing blend of tomatoes and savory chicken or vegetable broth.

rice.name: Coconut Rice
rice.description: This is a tropical and aromatic dish made from long-grain white rice, gently cooked in rich and creamy coconut milk.

rice.name: Italian Biryani
rice.description: This is made from long-grain white rice sautéed with onions and garlic, then cooked with tomatoes, chicken or vegetable broth, and seasoned with spices such as cumin, chili powder, and sometimes saffron or annatto.

rice.name: Chicken Biryani
rice.description: This is a sumptuous dish crafted from long-grain basmati rice, marinated chicken pieces, and a medley of aromatic spices.

rice.name: Fish Biryani
rice.description: This is a delectable dish crafted from long-grain basmati rice and tender pieces of marinated fish.

Pizza.name: Neapolitan Pizza
Pizza.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from a thin-crust base made of high-quality wheat flour, kneaded with fresh yeast and water.

Pizza.name: Margherita Pizza
Pizza.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from a thin-crust base made of high-quality wheat flour, topped with a harmonious trio of fresh ingredients.

Pizza.name: Pepperoni Pizza
Pizza.description: The pizza is generously topped with a rich tomato sauce, stretchy mozzarella cheese, and spicy slices of pepperoni.

Pizza.name: Sicilian Pizza
Pizza.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from a thick and fluffy focaccia-like crust, generously topped with a vibrant blend of tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and a variety of savory toppings.

ugali.name: Ugali and Chicken
ugali.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from maize flour and served with tender pieces of chicken stewed in a rich and aromatic tomato-based sauce.

ugali.name: Ugali and Fish
ugali.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from maize flour and served with a flavorful fish stew or grilled fish.

ugali.name: Ugali and Spinach
ugali.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from maize flour and served with sautéed spinach flavored with garlic, onions, and tomatoes.

ugali.name: Ugali and Matumbo
ugali.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from maize flour and served with tender pieces of tripe cooked in a rich and spicy gravy.

ugali.name: Ugali and Beef
ugali.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from maize flour and served with succulent pieces of beef cooked in a savory and spicy gravy.

stew.name: Beef Stew
stew.description: A classic dish made with chunks of beef, carrots, potatoes, and onions, simmered in a rich and flavorful broth often seasoned with herbs like thyme and bay leaves.

stew.name: Chicken Stew
stew.description: This stew features tender pieces of chicken cooked with vegetables such as carrots, celery, and potatoes, in a savory broth seasoned with herbs and spices.

stew.name: Fish Stew
stew.description: A French seafood stew made with a variety of fish and shellfish, cooked with tomatoes, onions, garlic, and herbs, often served with crusty bread.

Pasta.name: Spaghetti Pasta
Pasta.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from long, thin cylindrical strands of pasta, cooked to al dente perfection.

Pasta.name: Macaroni Pasta
Pasta.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from short, curved tubes of pasta, offering a comforting and familiar shape.

Pasta.name: Tortellini Pasta
Pasta.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from small, ring-shaped pasta pockets, traditionally filled with a mixture of meat, cheese, or vegetables.

Pasta.name: Fettuccine Pasta
Pasta.description: This is a delightful dish crafted from flat, wide noodles of pasta, providing a satisfying bite and a generous surface area to hold rich sauces.

variety.name: Chips Masala
variety.description: This is a delightful snack crafted from thin slices of potato, deep-fried until crispy and seasoned with a spicy and tangy masala mix.

variety.name: Samosa
variety.description: This is a delightful pastry crafted from a crispy and flaky dough, filled with a savory mixture of meat and lentils.

variety.name: Sausage
variety.description: The meat is seasoned with a blend of herbs and spices such as garlic, fennel, paprika, and pepper, enhancing its flavor and adding depth to the dish.

variety.name: Smokie
variety.description: The smokie is smoked to infuse it with a rich and smoky flavor, enhancing its savory profile.

variety.name: Chapati
variety.description: It is dish cooked on a hot griddle or skillet until it puffs up and develops a golden-brown crust.

Drinks.name: Coffee
Drinks.description: This is a beverage brewed from roasted coffee beans. Darkly colored, bitter, and slightly acidic.

Drinks.name: Smoothies
Drinks.description: This is a thick, creamy beverages usually blended from puréed fruits, vegetables, juices, yogurt, nuts, seeds, and/or dairy or nondairy milk.

Drinks.name: Milkshakes
Drinks.description: This is a sweet beverage made by blending milk, ice cream, and flavorings or sweeteners.

Drinks.name: Mango Juice
Drinks.description: This is a juice made from blended mango fruit with added flavours.

Drinks.name: Pineapple Juice
Drinks.description: This is a juice made from pressing the natural liquid out from the pulp of the pineapple

Drinks.name: Orange Juice
Drinks.description: This is a liquid extract of the orange tree fruit, produced by squeezing or reaming oranges
